title: Redeemer
description: Sent nearly thirty years into the past as an unwilling test subject in a radical time travel experiment, Ezekiel Cross embarks on a perilous adventure, in which he must save his younger self from the deadly path that forged him into the ruthless killer that he is. This edge-of-your-seat thriller is both gangster saga and science fiction epic – “Goodfellas” meets “The Time Machine”.
author: Balogun Ojetade
